features: 【Battery Operated Stroller Fan】The handheld fan rechargeable equipped with 2600mAh battery, powered by USB or Battery. There is type-C port on the back of the clip on fan head and you can charge via a computer, laptop, mobile power, USB charger, mobile phone adapter, car charger, etc. The batter life is about 4-14 hours. 4-7 hours for full recharge.

【Flexible Tripod Fan】The personal fan is made of upgraded bendable metal and silicone, which can be gripped, wrapped, bent or made stand stably. Non-toxic, odorless, easy to clean, waterproof, not easy to stain.

【LED Lights & Aromatherapy】Unique LED lights : Single light color mode and auto changing color light mode, light up the night, keep your baby feeling safe, and convenient for parents to take care of the baby at night. The baby fan for stroller with Aromatherapy not only allows you to enjoy the cool but also smells a faint fragrance. You can put your favorite essential oil or vanilla into the cover slot of the fan head to blow out the scent to relieve your emotions or keep you fresh all day!

【Ultra Quiet & Design for Baby】One key can switch 5 wind speed modes, you can choose a suitable wind speed for your baby. The noise generated by the rechargeasble fan is very small, the baby will sleep more soundly, and is free from mosquito bites, which will not wake up easily.

【Versatile stroller fan rechargable】The crib fan with a flexible tripod/Legs, versatile and easy to clip on most strollers, crib, wheelchair, carriage and etc in any position. it’s a lifesaver for car seat, especially those with rear facing, your kid and you can enjoy cool and comfortable ride

Battery Operated Fan with Aromatherapy How to use the aromatherapy? Step 1: Unscrew the cover Step 2: Put the aromatherapy pad in the portable fan. DC brushless Motor Quiet but strong airflow Led fan 2 light modes to choose Type-c Battery Fan You can use the fan while charging. Refuel the battery by power bank or wall charger, never worry about power off and stuck in hot environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great fan for infants. It keep my children cool in Texas hot summers. Only thing is that my first order came with a missing back piece to the battery, no charger, and I just noticed I didn’t receive the aromatherapy oil. They’re sending a replacement so I’m hoping all is there this time, but until then I will be ordering another one for my other child

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid fan, with bonus lighting & aromatherapy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Solid fan! I waited at least a month before reviewing, as other reviewers stated that they had issues with the battery life. I have not, I have been quite impressed with the battery life!I purchased this fan to use on a stationary bike (Schwinn IC4 that I lovingly call my Fauxleton), and it is perfectly up to the task. As a bonus, it has passive charging, so I can keep it charged while using it - it plugs right into the bike with included USB-USB-C cable.I thought the disco lights were fun, and the included scent disc has lasted a long while. I imagine that you can add essential oil drops if you so desire and freshen it up once the scent lowers.10/10 meets my expectations! Would certainly Re-purchase or recommend to a friend. N.B. I DID NOT receive perks for this review, but the company does include a card to give you “VIP membership” in response to reviews - they don’t mention any star rating or otherwise sway reviews, which I liked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little fan
reviews.reviewText: I got this fan to help keep my baby cool when he’s buckled in his infant seat in his stroller and it’s working great so far. We’ve been using it for a few days and it seems very sturdy and the battery life is great. The pretty lights are a fun feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good powerful fan. The only minus is that the back fell off easily and then the battery was lost. Doesn’t work without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy it’s complete JUNK!
reviews.reviewText: This Fan stopped working after using it one time. Had it turned on for 5 minutes after taking forever to make it turn on. Turned it off & wont even cut back on. Don’t recommend buying this product at all. Horrible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So great for the hospital!
reviews.reviewText: We were able to hang this fan while I labored for five hours, hang it on my hospital bed when I was admitted for five days, and the baby’s bed for keeping cool and help with sleeping from the noise of the fan. One of our nurses even came and sat by it while doing some of her computer work and watching me because it was so nice and cool. 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does the trick for the stroller or whatever you need to have a little extra fan on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my little one at Disney!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to attach to the stroller for a Disney trip with my toddler. It was perfect. You don’t hear it a bit when you’re outside. Inside it’s a low hum like any other fan. The battery life is…OK. We got maybe 5 hours of use on first level. You may want to watch little ones wandering fingers if you’re thinking of using in close proximity. The slats are definitely wide enough for fingers to fit and get ouchies.
